thread.title: Judge fights tears sentencing wickedly cruel couple for twisted attacks on two young girls - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Judge fights tears sentencing wickedly cruel couple for twisted attacks on two young girls - Yahoo7

author: Yahoo News On February
title: Judge fights tears sentencing wickedly cruel couple for twisted attacks on two young girls - Yahoo7
text:
Share Judge fights tears sentencing wickedly cruel couple for twisted attacks on two young girls - Yahoo7 A UK judge has fought back tears as he sentenced a depraved couple who raped two young girls, abused them and at times, forced them to eat their own vomit. Close VIDEO News break – February 25. Source: 7 News News break – February 25 
Judge Denis Watson said he “didn’t think he would ever forget” details of the horrific twisted attacks on girls aged just eight years old. 
Michael Miszczak and his former wife Sandra Jones were found guilty of child cruelty earlier this month and appeared in front of Judge Watson for sentencing. Miszczak and Jones were found guilty of child cruelty. Photo: Yahoo News 
The court previously heard Miszczak would make the girls strip down and fight each other before raping them. 
The court also the 54-year-old also rubbed a girl’s face in her own urine after she wet herself, and forced the girls to eat their own vomit. 
The 54-year-old showed no emotion as he was found guilty of 10 charges including child rape, indecent assault and child cruelty. 
He was sentenced to 25 years behind bars, with a minimum of 17 years before being considered for parole. 
Jones was convicted of four charges including aiding and abetting rape and shook her head in the dock as she was convicted. 
The court had heard Jones used to beat the girls, and on one occasion punched one of the victims as she was being brutally raped. 
“It was wickedly cruel, chillingly heartless and utterly inhuman,” Judge Watson said, of Jones’s behaviour. 
Lawyers acting for the couple had argued the victims were “fantasists” and had made up allegations. 
Jones was jailed for 14 years.
